page.title: 06Farming - Bassetts Manor
page.content: Bassetts Manor is a beef raising farm. The acreage is: woodland - 20 acres,hayfields - Top of Castle Hill 6 acres,Oaks 16 acres. { Grazing.}The fields have all got names: Harrups 14 acres,Bottom of Castle Hill 4 acres,Pond 9 acres, Autumn 9 acres, Butchers Cross 4 acres.Bentlands 4 acres,Oxleas 10 acres,Stable 10 acres,Station 17 acres,Denshires 9 acres, and Corner 5 acres. {Silage-}Birch 11 acres, Berry 14 acres,Twenty Acres 20 acres, and well 17 acres.Total 62 acres.{ {Livestock-}50 Friesian In-calf heifers,50 Friesian Yearlings,60 Friesian Bulling heifers,45 Hereford X Fresian steers,43 Fresian 9 month old calves and one bull 'Billy',making 249 animals. There are also some horses:- Caspar,Bumpkin,Crispin,Pedro,Lecco, Fiji,Trouble,Basil and Boffin.
